snippet: Kazan has spent the decade since its 2005 millennium celebration reinventing itself as a Russian athletics capital, becoming a top host of world and European tournaments.
abstract: Kazan, capital of republic of Tartastan and Russia's eighth-largest city, has spent last 10 years reinventing itself as epicenter of Russian athletics; in coming years, Kazan plans to welcome visitors to world-class sports complexes ready for anything from field hockey to boxing, gymnastics, world championship swimming events, and soccer's 2018 World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Kazan has spent the decade since its 2005 millennium celebration reinventing itself as a Russian athletics capital, becoming a top host of world and European tournaments.

headline.main: Kazan, a Russian Cultural Hub, Finds It’s Good at Sports
headline.print_headline: A Cultural Hub Finds That It’s Good at Sports
